arabicText: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ لَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ

translations.en: NAY! I call to witness this land –
translations.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ لَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ

translations.en: this land in which thou art free to dwell -
and [I call to witness] parent and offspring:
Verily, We have created man into [a life of] pain, toil and trial.

arabicText: أَیَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن یَقۡدِرَ عَلَیۡهِ أَحَدࣱ

translations.en: Does he, then, think that no one has power over him?
translations.ar: أَیَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن یَقۡدِرَ عَلَیۡهِ أَحَدࣱ

translations.en: He boasts, "I have spent wealth abundant!"
Does he, then, think that no one sees him?
Have We not given him two eyes,
and a tongue, and a pair of lips,
and shown him the two highways [of good and evil]?
But he would not try to ascend the steep uphill road...
And what could make thee conceive what it is, that steep uphill road?
[It is] the freeing of one's neck [from the burden of sin],

arabicText: أَوۡ إِطۡعَـٰمࣱ فِی یَوۡمࣲ ذِی مَسۡغَبَةࣲ

translations.en: or the feeding, upon a day of [one's own] hunger,
translations.ar: أَوۡ إِطۡعَـٰمࣱ فِی یَوۡمࣲ ذِی مَسۡغَبَةࣲ

translations.en: of an orphan near of kin,
or of a needy [stranger] lying in the dust –

arabicText: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ

translations.en: and being, withal, of those who have attained to faith, and who enjoin upon one another patience in adversity, and enjoin upon one another compassion.
translations.ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ

translations.en: Such are they that have attained to righteousness;

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

translations.en: whereas those who are bent on denying the truth of Our messages – they are such as have lost themselves in evil,
translations.ar: وَٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

translations.en: [with] fire closing in upon them.
